title: In case adjoining properties of an owner or different owner are separated by road, river, nallah etc
clause_text: In case adjoining properties of an owner or different owner are separated by road, river, nallah etc. then the Authority may allow the owner to construct underpass or over bridge or foot over bridge of required size at his cost so as to ease the movement of people / vehicle across the properties.
section: Approach by underpass or Over Bridge for adjoining properties
